name: BFTransmitterBeta
description:
An SDK that enables developers to work in an easy way with mesh networks in mobile devices (iOS/Android) between peers.
  It offers ways of allowing communications when Internet networks are unavailable or unstable using the Bridgefy mesh network algorithm.
  Devices can communicate between themselves by forming mesh networks that may or may not include a gateway to the Internet
